snippet: Ben S. Bernanke told a Congressional committee that the Federal Reserve stood ready to do more to support growth, but said the rest of the government also needs to act.
lead_paragraph: Ben S. Bernanke told a Congressional committee that the Federal Reserve stood ready to do more to support growth, but said the rest of the government also needs to act.

headline.main: Bernanke Urges Obama and Congress to Do More for Economy
headline.print_headline: Bernanke Urges Obama and Congress to Do More for Economy
headline.seo: Bernanke Urges Obama and Congress to Do More for Economy
